# vImageConverter_Retain

**Function**

Retains a vImage converter.

## Declaration

```swift
void vImageConverter_Retain(vImageConverterRef converter);
```

## Discussion

Retain a [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vImageConverter] instance when you receive it from elsewhere (that is, you didn’t create or copy it) and you want it to persist. If you retain a [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vImageConverter] instance you’re responsible for releasing it (see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/CoreFoundation/Conceptual/CFMemoryMgmt/CFMemoryMgmt.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/10000127i]).

## Memory management

- **vImageConverter_Release**: Releases a vImage converter.
title: vImageConverter_Retain
